label: Description
value: Tapered sheath, blue enamel surrounding silver floral pattern, two busts on each side. Silver mount and cap on due tip engraved in floral pattern, small ring on back of sheath.

label: Description
value: Tapered sheath, light purple enamel with multi-colored floral and scrolled pattern. On each side three flowers and two male busts in relief; profile with a wreath of laurels. Silver mount and cap. Cap engraved on each side with two crossed swords.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Blade straight-sided, the upper edge tapering towards the point. The blade engraved with acanthus foliage and flowers. Handle enameled, a medallion on each side of the handle: one showing Apollo, the other one of the Virtues, (Constancy?). Handle has flaring shape with a projecting ear on one side, silver engraved with two crossed swords.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Fork with two-pointed tines. Handle enameled, oval medallion on each side of of the handle; one showing DIANA, the other MUCIUS SCAEVOLO (Patience and Constancy?) . Handle similarly shaped as handle of knife.

value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Leaf-shaped blade, point broken of. Tapered handle with flat sides, openwork scrolls at the top of handle. Anno.1.6.2.2."

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value:
Fork has three curved tines, flat tapering handle with bowl-shaped end, scrolled shoulders. Hinged at neck, faceted sliding lock bar. Octagonal handle with engraved fish-bone decoration and floral design, baluster shaped top.

Oval spoon bowl, engraved on back with symmetrical floral design. Two slots on the back of bowl to attach the fork.

label: Dimensions
value: L x W (fork): 15.5 x 1.9 cm (6 1/8 x 3/4 in.) L x W (spoon bowl): 6.3 x 4.2 cm (2 1/2 x 1 5/8 in.)

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value:
Fork has three curved tines, shoulders scrolled. Hinged at neck, faceted sliding lock bar. Octagonal handle with engraved fishbone decoration, baluster-shaped top.

Large oval spoon bowl with three rings on the back to hold the tines of the fork. Simple engraved decoration on the bowl of the spoon.

Back of handle has decorative pattern.
